MILD.name: Peach Mild
MILD.full_description: Sweet, juicy peaches create a delightfully fruity and mild salsa.

MILD.name: Spanish Verde Mild
MILD.full_description: A mild green salsa with fresh tomatillos and herbs.

MILD.name: Strawberry Mild
MILD.full_description: Fresh strawberries bring unexpected sweetness to this unique mild salsa.

MILD.name: Raspberry Mild
MILD.full_description: Tart raspberries create a sophisticated, mildly sweet salsa.

MILD.name: Pineapple Mild
MILD.full_description: Tropical pineapple brings bright, sweet flavors to this refreshing mild salsa.

MILD.name: Mango Mild
MILD.full_description: Ripe mangos blend beautifully with mild spices for a tropical twist.

MILD.name: Garden Fresh Cilantro Salsa Mild
MILD.full_description: Fresh cilantro takes center stage in this bright, herbaceous mild salsa.

MILD.name: Original Mild
MILD.full_description: Our signature mild salsa made with fresh tomatoes, onions, and perfect spices.

MILD.name: Cherry Mild
MILD.full_description: Sweet cherries create a delightfully fruity and mild salsa.

MEDIUM.name: Clovis Medium (Original Medium Chunky)
MEDIUM.full_description: Our most popular salsa! Perfect balance of flavor and heat.

HOT.name: Cherry Hot
HOT.full_description: Sweet cherries meet fiery heat in this unique hot salsa with bold flavors.

HOT.name: Spanish Verde Hot
HOT.full_description: A fiery green salsa with tomatillos and hot peppers for serious heat lovers.

HOT.name: Roasted Pineapple Habanero Hot
HOT.full_description: Roasted tropical pineapple balances intense habanero heat.

HOT.name: Garden Fresh Cilantro Salsa Hot
HOT.full_description: Fresh cilantro meets fiery peppers in this bright, spicy salsa.

HOT.name: Original X Hot
HOT.full_description: Our hottest salsa yet! Fire-roasted peppers create intense heat and incredible flavor.

HOT.name: Chipotle Hot
HOT.full_description: Smoky chipotle peppers deliver intense heat and deep, complex flavors.

HOT.name: Original Hot
HOT.full_description: For heat lovers! This bold salsa packs serious flavor with a kick that builds.

HOT.name: Cherry Chocolate Hot
HOT.full_description: Dark cherries and rich chocolate meet scorching heat in this gourmet salsa.

EXTRA_HOT.name: Ghost of Clovis
EXTRA_HOT.full_description: An otherworldly hot salsa featuring ghost peppers that will haunt your taste buds.

EXTRA_HOT.name: Spanish Verde X X Hot
EXTRA_HOT.full_description: A double-extra-hot green salsa made with tomatillos and the hottest peppers.

FRUIT.name: Green Apple
FRUIT.full_description: Crisp green apples bring a tart, refreshing twist to this unique fruit salsa.

FRUIT.name: Mango Habanero
FRUIT.full_description: Sweet tropical mango meets spicy habanero peppers in perfect balance.

FRUIT.name: Roasted Garlic & Olives
FRUIT.full_description: Delicious Roasted Garlic & Olives salsa made with premium ingredients.

FRUIT.name: Raspberry BBQ Chipotle
FRUIT.full_description: Raspberries meet smoky chipotle and BBQ spices - perfect for grilling.

FRUIT.name: Jamaican Jerk
FRUIT.full_description: Caribbean spices and scotch bonnet peppers create authentic Jamaican jerk flavors.

FRUIT.name: Chipotle Con Queso
FRUIT.full_description: Creamy cheese dip with smoky chipotle peppers - perfect for chips.

FRUIT.name: Black Bean Corn Pablano
FRUIT.full_description: A hearty salsa with black beans, sweet corn, and roasted poblano peppers.
